dcterms:creator: N. Silberman
D. Hoiem
P. Kohli
R. Fergus
dcterms:description: The NYU dataset consists of 1,449 realistic indoor RGB-D scenes captured via a Kinect sensor. It is widely used for evaluating semantic scene completion methods, although it has issues with misalignments between depth images and corresponding 3D labels.
dcterms:title: NYU Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Firman
O. Mac Aodha
S. Julier
G. J. Brostow
dcterms:description: The NYUCAD dataset is a high-quality synthetic dataset designed to avoid misalignments found in the NYU dataset. It provides depth maps projected from ground truth annotations, making it suitable for evaluating semantic scene completion methods.
dcterms:title: NYUCAD Dataset
